settings.title: 1967 FORD MUSTANG FASTBACK
settings.text:
1967 FORD MUSTANG FASTBACK

This car was made infamous by the 'Gone in Sixty Seconds' movie franchise.

Someone is going to win this incredible car! This car is on the Eleanor international register. It comes with certificate and official registry documentation.

For your best chance to win, grab a VIP membership now and you will automatically be entered in to win this Mustang and all future giveaways. VIP membership gives you compounding ticket entries each month, so the longer you stay a member, the more entries you receive into each of our giveaways. Or, grab a single entry into this draw, one time payment only.

This car is rare, highly collectible and appreciating in value. Follow us on socials for future giveaway updates and new video releases.

Valued at $237,50.

Promotion open to all Australian states, excluding South Australia. Must be 18+ yrs old to enter.

Draw closes 17th Feb 2023.

Winner announced 18th Feb 2023.

Permit Number:Â NTP/05558
